title: "Microsoft introduces Hindi, Indian English to Neural Text-to- Speech service"
excerpt: "Microsoft India has announced the addition of English (India) and Hindi to its Neural Text to Speech (Neural TTS) service language set, featuring the two languages among the 15 new dialects added to the service enabled with state-of-the-art AI audio quality."
